plays.text: Penalty to Chris Therien 2 minutes for Slashing Shawn McEachern
Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick unassisted

Penalty to DONALD BRASHEAR 2 minutes for Roughing Wade Redden
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Wade Redden and Karel Rachunek
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Hooking Daniel Alfredsson
Goal scored by Simon Gagne assisted by Jeremy Roenick and Mark Recchi
Penalty to Sami Salo 2 minutes for Roughing Paul Ranheim
Goal scored by Kim Johnsson assisted by Jeremy Roenick and Simon Gagne
